--- In gladiator@y..., "Rory Wilde" <laughingmadman@h...> wrote:
> i'm changing my e-mail, but i'm not sure how to update the sending 
e-mail in 
> yahoogroups

I am going to give you step by step directions.

Go to http://groups.yahoo.com/myprefs .  Then click on the 'Edit' 
button that is next to email addresses.  Then you add the new email 
address in the spot indicated by the page.  Then you go to the bottom 
and click 'save changes'.  

Once that's done, visit every group that you want to change where 
email is sent to and click on 'edit my membership' and go to the 
bottom where to says 'choose the address to send email' and chnage the 
email address to your new one.  Then click 'save changes'.
